description: On today's show, FTC Chairwoman Edith Ramirez talks about the commission’s report on data brokers. Plus, Sree Sreenivasan, digital officer at The Metropolitan Museum of Art, talks about digitizing the collection and opening up the museum’s archives online.
teaser: On today's show, FTC Chairwoman Edith Ramirez talks about the commission’s report on data brokers. Plus, Sree Sreenivasan, digital officer at The Metropolitan Museum of Art, talks about digitizing the collection and opening up the museum’s archives online.
title: Marketplace Tech for Wednesday, May 28, 2014
